title: I am starting to have nightmares from playing against twitch.
body: This is worse than pre rework rengar. I have had so many games where we were winning a team fight then suddenly twitch appears out of nowhere and massacres our team in 2 seconds. I have started to ban twitch in every draft game. I now have nightmares where I am with a group of people walking around then some rat with a gun appears out of nowhere and kills us all.
